title: Mobile-Based Design Maker Learning Community Building Project

context.prior_knowledge: Design Thinking and Basic Digital Tool Utilization Skills
context.additional_context: A course where science professionals form learning communities through project execution in smartphone-optimized mobile learning environments.

learning_goals: Learners collaborate with design maker peers via mobile platforms to develop three practical science prototypes.
Learners develop the competency to perform over 80% of learning activities remotely using open-source tools and mobile apps.
Learners expand the knowledge base of the learning community by sharing at least two case studies of on-site problem-solving applied with the maker space concept.

resources: Portable Maker Kit (3D Pen, Mini Laser Cutter, etc.)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
